str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To dig, excavate. Apparently a primary verb; to dig.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Manure; a dung-hill. From kopros; manure.
